method.name: POST
method.doc: This web service will list all of the POPs that contain a given POP extended attribute name and POP extended attribute value.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: admin_id
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator name.

param.name: admin_pwd
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administrator password.

param.name: admin_domain
param.doc: The Security Verify Access administration domain. The 'Default' domain will be used if this parameter is not supplied.

param.name: pop_attribute_name
param.doc: The name of the POP extended attribute to search for.This parameter is required only if pop_name and pop_attribute_value are not specified. If it is specified then only objects with a POP attached with an extended attribute of this name will be returned. pop_attribute_value[String,Optional] The value of the POP extended attribute to search for. This parameter is required only if pop_name and pop_attribute_name are not specified. If it is specified then only objects with a POP attached with an extended attribute of this value will be returned.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.

representation.name: PopListJsonResponse
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.
